hero.title: 🏡 Buckhorn Lodge — Iconic Smoky Mountain Retreat
hero.sub: 2140 Tudor Mountain Road, Gatlinburg • Near Great Smoky Mountains National Park
hero.tag: A Smoky Mountain Icon — Renovated 2022–2023, Ready for Its Next Chapter
hero.desc: 🔥 Discover Buckhorn Lodge on nearly 10 private acres. This ~5,000 sq ft estate blends timeless rustic Smokies character with modern luxury. Hand-crafted woodwork, expansive decks with sweeping mountain views, and large gathering spaces make this a rare find. International buyers welcome — cross-border closing guidance available.

items.title: Tourism & Demand
items.body: America’s most-visited national park; strong year-round rental demand.

items.title: Location
items.body: Gatlinburg • Pigeon Forge • Sevierville — world-class access and amenities.

items.title: Access
items.body: ~1 hr Knoxville (TYS), ~2 hrs Asheville (AVL); highways I-40 / I-75.
